thread.title: Unchanged England lose toss as Pakistan opt to bat first in second Test in Dubai
thread.title_full: Unchanged England lose toss as Pakistan opt to bat first in second Test in Dubai

title: Unchanged England lose toss as Pakistan opt to bat first in second Test in Dubai
text:
Unchanged England lose toss as Pakistan opt to bat first in second Test in Dubai 22 Oct 2015 05:46:59 
comments 
Ben Stokes was fit, after his stomach bug, to take his place in an unchanged England team for the second Test against Pakistan in Dubai. 
The tourists unsurprisingly stuck with the line-up which came so close to going 1-0 up in Abu Dhabi last week. 
For Pakistan, fit-again leg-spinner Yasir Shah replaced seamer Rahat Ali in their only change. 
Pakistan won the toss and chose to bat on a pitch expected to have a little more pace than the first Test, and to favour spin. Related Sport News
